sys_script_include.name: PDFGenerator

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_ffcd6d8583fdea1034af11b6feaad323
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1755581_demo3.PDFGenerator</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>PDFGenerator</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var PDFGenerator = Class.create();
PDFGenerator.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    generatePDF: function(recordId, tableName) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
        if (gr.get(recordId)) {
            var pdf = new PDFDocument();
            pdf.addText("Record: " + gr.getDisplayValue());
            // 更复杂的PDF生成逻辑...
            return pdf;
        }
        return null;
    },
    type: 'PDFGenerator'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-05-27 07:15:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>ffcd6d8583fdea1034af11b6feaad323</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PDFGenerator</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Demo3" source="x_1755581_demo3">5c43e94983bdea1034af11b6feaad324</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Demo3">5c43e94983bdea1034af11b6feaad324</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ffcd6d8583fdea1034af11b6feaad323</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-05-27 07:15:43</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
